item.title: Announcing the Vienna PHP User Group
item.description: I’ve been looking for a decent PHP user group here in Vienna for some time. Sadly, I haven’t found even a bad one. Now, I’m trying to change this: meet viennaphp.org. My goal is to create a friendly, welcoming and informative user group that allows beginners and experts alike to share their experiences, opinions and knowledge. I have always met great people when I worked with the open-source community and I think lots of people around here would benefit from it too.
